perturbation.original_text:
3.
Consideration. The Producer agrees and acknowledges that it will receive no upfront compensation for the rights it has granted herein and
that ConvergTV has no obligation to Producer to exercise any of its rights under this Agreement. The revenue share for the Program is stated
in Exhibit B. The Producer shall have thirty (30) days from the payment date to dispute the amount of any revenue share payout or any such
claim or dispute is hereby waived by the Producer.
perturbation.changed_text:
3.
Consideration. The Producer agrees and acknowledges that it will receive no upfront compensation for the rights it has granted herein and
that ConvergTV has no obligation to Producer to exercise any of its rights under this Agreement. The Producer shall have thirty (30) days from the payment date to dispute the amount of any revenue share payout or any such
claim or dispute is hereby waived by the Producer.
perturbation.explanation: By removing the sentence 'The revenue share for the Program is stated in Exhibit B,' the contract now references a revenue share without specifying where the details of that share are defined. Other sections of the document still assume that Exhibit B exists and details revenue sharing, leading to an internal contradiction and ambiguity regarding the financial terms of the agreement.
